description: The story of singer Tina Turner's rise to stardom and how she gained the courage to break free from her abusive husband, Ike Turner.
keywords: african american singer,african american woman,1980s,african american protagonist,female protagonist
name: What's Love Got to Do with It

original_info.id: What's Love Got to Do with It_1993
original_info.name: What's Love Got to Do with It

review.name: Excellent story of Ike and Tina,,,, and then Tina Turner.
review.reviewBody: I really loved Ike and Tina Turner. then I got to love Tina Turner. I remember I was so sad way back when they split up but,,... after seeing this movie SO SO,,, many years later, I see why. Maybe Ike was a driving force for the group, but Tina made it happen and as far as I can tell, Ike didn't like that he was then along for the ride... and couldn't accept it. It is Too bad he didn't know/or understand at the time what was or would've been best for for his kids and himself. Famous or not, til people understand it's FAMILY that matters, nothing will ever be right. I know this is a Hollywood-ish type-style movie, but I'm proud Tina did what she has done for herself, and I'm glad I got to grow up Knowing Both Ike and Tina, and then Tina Turner.... This is...history in the making.

trailer.description: Home Video Trailer from Touchstone Home Entertainment
trailer.name: What's Love Got to Do with It
